recipesJson.name: Rin's Aye Papi!
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Very tropical mix for Mixin' Vixens. Guanabana base brings creaminess and a pineapple-y banana esque feel. Mango and Papaya to boost tropical notes. Fizzy Sherbert to add a lime note. Marshmallow vanilla to smooth, add body and calm the bitter notes from all the fruits
